title: Colorado Gov. Hickenlooper's 'Independent Sheen' Has Faded
teaser: With less than a week to go before Election Day, the governor's race in Colorado remains tight between Democrat incumbent Gov. John Hickenlooper and Republican Rep. Bob Beauprez. Melissa Block talks to Denver Post political reporter John Frank about the race.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
